definition[0]: if you explain or describe something in terms of a particular fact or event, you are explaining or describing it only in relation to that fact or event
example[0]: It’s too early to start talking in terms of casualties.
example[1]: Femininity is still defined in terms of beauty.
note[0]: describe/measure/evaluate etc something in terms of something
example[2]: It’s a mistake to think of Florida only in terms of its tourist attractions.
example[3]: Did the experiment find any differences in terms of what children learned?
